nodes.text: The Cloak of the Kursk was a black robe worn by the leader of the Force using tradition known as the Blackguard, who held the title of Kursk. In 1 ABY the Kursk of the Blackguard at the time, San'sii, was killed during the Blackguard Purge by spacers hired by a Sullustan archaeologist named Mi Fon Lu to clear the Southern Jedi Ruins on the planet Mustafar where the Blackguard were based. The Cloak was taken by the spacers who killed San'sii as loot.

The cloak of the Kursk first appeared as an item in the MMORPG Star Wars Galaxies expansion Trials of Obi-Wan released in 2005. The item was available only as a drop from killing San'sii whom was an elite enemy targeted in the quest "An Archaeologist's Problem". The cloak later appeared in San'sii's card in the Star Wars Galaxies Trading Card Game expansion pack Agents of Deception which was released in 2009.
